entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:53 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
